title: Luxury 5-Bedroom Sea View Villa in Maenam
description:
• 5 Bedrooms / 5 Bathrooms 
• Private and serene location in Maenam Hills
• Stunning panoramic sea and jungle views 
• Open plan living/dining/kitchen with top grade appliances
• Beautifully renovated with premium finishing throughout 
• 10 meter infinity edge swimming pool  
• Land Size: 800 sqm
• Built Area: 700 sqm
• Freehold tenure 
• Chanote land title
